aboutpara: I am Madhusudhan K., a dedicated and passionate Python developer with a strong foundation in programming languages currently looking for remote jobs , My technical expertise extends to both front-end and back-end development with devops in Azure and some of data engineering Fluent in English and Kannada, I bring a blend of technical prowess and soft skills, ready to contribute to innovative projects, particularly in API development, visualization dashboards, and data science and analysis ,devops and data engineering ,Gen AI skills also Thank you ,Visit projects section for my work.
